summary: When Nirmal loses his family in a disaster caused by government corruption, he embarks on a journey seeking accountability and revenge.
cast: Irrfan Khan|Jimmy Sheirgill|Vishesh Bansal|Tushar Dalvi|Nitish Pandey|Kedar Bagaria|Manoj Bakshi|Sunil Bedi|Rajat Bhalla|Satyajit Bhattacharya|Akash Dabas|Rahul Dhir|Jitendra Gupta|Rajiv Gupta|Vikas Jain|Sadhil Kapoor|Vijay Kaushik|Sabir Khan|Ravi Mahasabde|Pallavi Mishra|Purva Parag|Sachin Pathak|Manish Raj|Dr. Vivek Rajpal|Ayesha Raza|Sanjeev Sahay|Umesh Shrivastav|Deepak Shroff|Gurvinder Singh|Vikrant Singh|Chandraprakash Thakur|Neha Atri
title: Madaari
